name: Awesome Modifier Icons
description: Makes D, J, S, H, and F blocks have icons instead of a letter!

solid-border.name: Solid Border
solid-border.description: Makes the border of the blocks solid instead of dotted

show-letter.name: Show Letters
show-letter.description: Show the letters instead of hiding them

move-f-block.name: Move F block
move-f-block.description: Moves the F block to be next to the other modifier blocks rather than separated by the force blocks.
